tool_description: Website keywords research API -  Uncover any websites’ ranking keywords and traffic
name: SEO - Website ranking keywords
title: SEO - Website ranking keywords

api_list.name: GetRankingKeywords

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description:
country code 
List of supported locations - https://boostramp.com/developers/list-of-supported-locations-for-keywords-research-apis

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: two symbols language code. For example, en,fr,ru,es,he,ar

optional_parameters.name: order_by
optional_parameters.description:
position - keywords will be ordered by ranking position
volume - keywords will be ordered by monthly search volume

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: each page contains 50 keywords, so if you want to get second page - type offset 50 and so on
